title: resource_control: resource group is not detected
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
master

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
any write workload with `resource-control.enabled=true`

### What did you expect?
resource group `ch-rg1` and `ch-rg2` are showed on metrics
### What did happened?
![1iJI5maupP](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13497871/217726654-34a1f8b1-d773-4332-870b-43ae3ffa9081.jpg)
